metadata.name: Bath-Taking
metadata.description:
**Have you ever felt as if submerged, without having your head underwater? This guy knows what it's like**. 

First scene of the life and story of the peculiar **Green Hatted Man**. His house, his pets, his rules. 



**4000px x 4000px at 280 dpi** (High Quality PDF Available)

**1/20**

Created by **Jobless_Architect (Cristian Galilea)**

**Digitally-hand made, brought straight from the images of a wandering mind**.

No road map nor weird stuff; just -**l'art pour l'art**-

This project was given shape with the idea that a drawing or a piece of art can only be framed to some extent. But what you can't frame is the **imagination of the beholder**. The artist may have had a motiv, but what comes to meet the eye of the viewer is entirely based upon his cultural livings and experiences.

The creator of the project is an architecture student from **Chile, South America**, whom firmly believes that art would not be as interesting, if it was to be looked at always by the same eye.
